column1: Little Goat Diner////Amazing! Amazing! Amazing! I wanted to try The Girl & The Goat
column2: but didn't want to spend that much. My friend told me that this place was a little more casual
column3: and run by the same chef. It did not disappoint. We started off with the goat chili cheese fries and they were delicious
column5: and flavorful. I got the most epic fish tostadas
column6: my friend got the delicious fat club sandwich
column7: and my other friend got los drowned. Everything was Â absolutely amazing. Our food got to the table right away
column9: and our cups were never empty. Highly recommend!!
